content: a strand of yarn about 40 long 2 find the center point and pull the strand of yarn through it so both ends are outside the body while the yarn is going through the center point of the underside of the body 3 bring the two sides of the strand together so the ends meet make a knot about halfway down the length of the folded strand tying the two sides together 4 put hook through the center of the magic_ring on the top rounded part of the body going through the stuffing to grab the strand 5 pull that loop through the top of the jellyfish careful to avoid pulling the stuffing out too now there is a loop by which to hang the jellyfish anchored to the underside nice tentacles you can make as many or as few of these depending on how you want the tentacles to look make 6 1 chain 81 turn 2 skip one chain stitch slip_stitch in next chain increase with two single_crochet in every stitch after except ending with slip_stitch in last chain 3 tie off 4 use the tails to tie the tentacles to the underside of the jellyfish 5 pull all loose ends inside of the body cut 8-14 strands of yarn about 36 long fold each strand in half attach them to the underside of the jellyfish like fringe but in single strands 1 pull the fold into the inside of the body then pull it back outside the body through a nearby hole to make a loop on the outside 2 put the ends of that strand through the loop then pull the loop tightly closed around the strands
